sub_title: Rule Engineer @ Rabobank | Voice Over Artist
summary:
As a software engineer, I want to contribute to solving some of the world's problems through my analytical and software skills as well as my business background. I love working in challenging environments and learning hands on. 

I am passionate about Problem Solving, data analytics and business rules. I also have a business background with over 6 years of experience in managing, leading, mentoring at internationally recognized organizations and more.

profile_positions.description:
Junior Rule Engineer @ CDD Risk Detection - KYC Tech || Young Professional Program-IT
Task Summary : I elicitate, analyse and write Business rules. || Create & maintain CDD chain.
Tasks:
-I give advice on business requirements.
-I design applicqtions together with business, architect and DevOps Squads.
-I implement design principles and detail architecture in usable components.
-I help maintain a rock solid and fit for purpose architecture. 
-I help mitigating technical debt and maximizing compliancy.
-I help in finding the right information out of big sets of data.
profile_positions.title: DevOps Engineer

profile_positions.description:
•	I regularly met with the development team and the product owners to define the scope and scale of software projects.
•	I designed web applications architecture.
•	I managed many releases working closely with many teams to meet development and delivery deadlines.
•	I designed and implemented scalable web services, applications and APIs.
•	I Improved software efficiency and reduced bottlenecks in the delivery pipeline.
•	I performed daily troubleshooting and bug fixes.
•	I performed necessary day-to-day GIT support for different projects.
•	I participated in implanting the process for release management, automated deployment, configuration management, and monitoring.
profile_positions.title: Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
•	I designed and built an android application for the collection the Concentration Points’ geolocations of the telecom network.
•	I collaborated with cross-functional teams to define, design and ship new features.
•	I performed regular troubleshooting and bug fixes to improve the application performance.
•	I continuously monitored the application and implemented new technologies to maximize development efficiency.

profile_positions.title: Student Branch Vice-Chair

profile_positions.description:
The Hult Prize at Campus Director (CD) plays a critical role in the overall Hult Prize experience. Each CD is an official and essential member of the Hult Prize organization - the world’s largest student movement for social impact.

The position enjoys all of the benefits of being a part of the Hult Prize community and network of partners, and will entail a lifelong relationship with the wider Hult Prize community of universities, companies and social entrepreneurs. Major responsibilities are:

- Raise awareness about the opportunities for business and start-ups to exist in the social enterprise sector.
- Recruiting an organizing committee.
- Recruiting teams to compete in the Hult Prize event at EPI Sousse.
- Select high profile people for an independent jury, who will give an external perspective and be able to choose the top team of EPI Sousse. 
- Organizing the semi final and finals of the Hult Prize competition at EPI Sousse.
- Prepare the winning team to participate in one of the Hult Prize regionals at: Boston, San Francisco, Dubai, London or Shanghai.
profile_positions.title: Campus Director
